title: RapidDock
description: Accelerating protein-ligand docking with geometric deep learning.
detailed_description: RapidDock combines equivariant models with simulation constraints to improve docking speed while preserving chemical realism.
key_achievements: Open benchmark and reproducible training scripts

title: SingleCell Foundation Model
description: Transfer learning for single-cell transcriptomic annotation.
detailed_description: A transformer-based model trained on multi-cohort datasets for robust cell-state classification.
key_achievements: Integrated model into internal analysis pipeline
